form.official-title: To amend the Oregon Resource Conservation Act of 1996 to reauthorize the Deschutes River Conservancy Working Group, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Deschutes River Conservancy Reauthorization Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of Deschutes River Conservancy Working Group

subsection.text: Section 301(a) of the Oregon Resource Conservation Act of 1996 (Public Law 104–208; 110 Stat. 3009–534; 122 Stat. 836) is amended by striking paragraph (1) and inserting the following:

paragraph.text: The term Working Group means the Deschutes River Conservancy Working Group composed of a board of directors of not fewer than 10, but not more than 15, members nominated by the group represented by the member, of whom—

subparagraph.text: 2 members shall be representatives of the environmental community in the Deschutes River Basin;
2 members shall be representatives of the irrigated agriculture community in the Deschutes River Basin;
2 members shall be representatives of the Confederated Tribes of the Warm Springs Reservation of Oregon;
1 member shall be a representative of the hydroelectric production community in the Deschutes River Basin;
1 member shall be a representative of 1 of the Federal agencies with authority and responsibility in the Deschutes River Basin;
1 member shall be a representative of an agency of the State of Oregon with authority and responsibility in the Deschutes River Basin, such as—

clause.text: the Oregon Department of Fish and Wildlife; or
the Oregon Water Resources Department; and

subparagraph.text: 1 member shall be a representative of a unit of local government in the Deschutes River Basin.

subsection.text: Section 301 of the Oregon Resource Conservation Act of 1996 (Public Law 104–208; 110 Stat. 3009–534; 122 Stat. 836) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (3), by striking 2016 and inserting 2032; and
in paragraph (6), by striking 5 percent and inserting 10 percent; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (h), by striking 2016 and inserting 2032.
